## LogMessage interface

Log message with its context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LogMessage 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [category](./common.logmessage.category.md) | <code>string</code> | Message category, "ERROR" if error message. |
|  [context](./common.logmessage.context.md) | <code>string[]</code> | Message runtime context. |
|  [error](./common.logmessage.error.md) | <code>unknown</code> | Error, if any. |
|  [message](./common.logmessage.message.md) | <code>string</code> | Message text. |
|  [ts](./common.logmessage.ts.md) | <code>Date</code> | Message timestamp. |
